//Generated by BehavEd

rem ( "temporary tests for ibi to lua conversion" );

if ( $get( VECTOR, "SET_ORIGIN")$, $=$, $tag( "targetname", ORIGIN)$ )
{
	print ( $get( FLOAT, "SET_PARM1")$ );
}


else (  )
{
	print ( $random( 0, 1 )$ );
}


affect ( "myEnt", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "runscript" )
	{
		run ( "coolscript" );
	}

}


loop ( 3 )
{
	print ( "foo//bar" );
}


loop ( -1 )
{
	print ( "endless loop" );
}
